  • Method Details

    • addPart

      public static void addPart(Part newPart)
      Parameters:
      newPart - is added to allParts

    • addProduct

      public static void addProduct(Product newProduct)
      Parameters:
      newProduct - is added to allProducts

    • lookUpPart

      public static Part lookUpPart(int partId)
      Parameters:
      partId - used to search through allParts for a matching part ID
      Returns:
      Part object with the matching part ID

    • lookUpPart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookUpPart(String partName)
      Parameters:
      partName - used to search through allParts for a matching part name
      Returns:
      Part object with the matching part name or an empty list if no item is found

      LOGIC ERROR: Experienced an issue when the user searched for a part without proper casing to match the part's name in the inventory. No results would be returned because the part began with a capital letter and the user failed to input a capital letter in their search term. Implemented toLowerCase from the String library that removes all casing from both the part name and the user's input so that input validation and character matching could occur more fluidly.

    • addTestData

      public static void addTestData()
      Sample data used to test the inventory system. Adds parts and product to the allParts and allProducts lists.

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart(int index, Part p)
      Parameters:
      index - is used to declare the desired position of the Part in allParts
      p - specifies which part is being updated

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart(Part p)
      Parameters:
      p - specifies which part is to be deleted
      Returns:
      true when the part is successfully deleted, false when the part is not located in allParts

    • getAllParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getAllParts()
      Returns:
      the allParts list

    • lookUpProduct

      public static Product lookUpProduct(int productId)
      Parameters:
      productId - is the Id being searched through the allProducts list to find the product
      Returns:
      the product once found or null if it cannot be found

    • lookUpProduct

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookUpProduct(String productName)
      Parameters:
      productName - specifies the name to search for in the allProducts list
      Returns:
      the list of products that match the searched name. The list will be empty if no products were found.

      LOGIC ERROR Experienced an issue when the user searched for a product without proper casing to match the product's name in the inventory. No results would be returned because the product began with a capital letter and the user failed to input a capital letter in their search term. Implemented toLowerCase from the String library that removes all casing from both the product name and the user's input so that input validation and character matching could occur more fluidly.

    • updateProduct

      public static void updateProduct(int index, Product newProduct)
      Parameters:
      index - specifies the index at which to set the product to
      newProduct - is the product being updated

    • deleteProduct

      public static boolean deleteProduct(Product newProduct)
      Parameters:
      newProduct - specifies the product that is being set for deletion
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully deleted, false if the product was not found

    • getAllProducts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllProducts()
      Returns:
      the allProducts list when prompted
